review_data.title: Excellent Shanghai food
review_data.content: Plain and unpretentious atmosphere, but a top-of-the-range food experience. This must be Shanghai food at its best, prepared by an Asian chef who makes food an art, beautifully presented. Service was pleasantly low-key, but prompt, friendly and professional.

review_data.title: Best Shanghai Food in Europe!
